data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Nikolay Voloshin signals a Ufa throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Ufa push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Catalin Carp gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the CSKA Moscow defence.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In Ufa Ufa attack through Timur Zhamaletdinov. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Neftyanik Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 11, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa push upfield but Nikolay Voloshin quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 14, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow just outside Ufa's area.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow's Konstantin Kuchaev is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 16, At Neftyanik Stadium, Konstantin Maradishvili for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Ufa.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Ivan Oblyakov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 22, CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Mario Fernandes, whose finish on goal is saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Igor Bezdenezhnykh (Ufa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 26, Ufa's Igor Bezdenezhnykh gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Ufa throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Ufa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ufa's Igor Bezdenezhnykh has been booked in Ufa.
In the minute 33, Nikolay Voloshin awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 35, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Ufa's area.
In the minute 40, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Chidera Ejuke for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Neftyanik Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ufa are caught offside.
In the minute 47, Nikolay Voloshin awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ufa's half.
Chidera Ejuke for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 51, In Ufa CSKA Moscow attack through Nikola Vlasic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Attention is being given to Ufa’s Igor Bezdenezhnykh and play has been suspended briefly.
Baktiyor Zaynutdinov returns to the field for CSKA Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 55, Ufa’s Igor Bezdenezhnykh is on his feet again at Neftyanik Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ufa's Azer Aliev gets in a shot on goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In Ufa, Lovro Bizjak of Ufa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 57, Important block from the Ufa defence as Chidera Ejuke fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Vadim Evseev (Ufa) has taken off Igor Bezdenezhnykh who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Danila Emelyanov is the replacement.
Throw-in Ufa.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Ufa are coming forward and Azer Aliev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Neftyanik Stadium.
Catalin Carp is booked for the home team.
In the minute 61, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 61, CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
The away team replace Konstantin Maradishvili with Kristijan Bistrovic.
The away team have replaced Konstantin Kuchaev with Fedor Chalov. This is the second substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
Ufa are pushing forward but Catalin Carp's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
In the minute 63, Chidera Ejuke of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
In the minute 64, Goal! Kristijan Bistrovic gives CSKA Moscow a 0-1 lead.
Fedor Chalov with an assist there.
In Ufa, Ufa push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Ufa make their second substitution with Olivier Thill replacing Lovro Bizjak.
In the minute 70, Vadim Evseev is making the team's third substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with Nikolay Giorgobyani replacing Artem Golubev.
CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Chidera Ejuke, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fedor Chalov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In Ufa CSKA Moscow drive forward through Fedor Chalov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ivan Oblyakov gets his shot on target but fails to score for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ufa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In Ufa Ufa drive forward through Aleksandr Sukhov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Chidera Ejuke is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Nayair Tiknizyan is replacing Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for CSKA Moscow at Neftyanik Stadium.
Chidera Ejuke, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Arnor Sigurdsson is the substitute for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 79, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
Ufa's Ionut Nedelcearu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, Nikolay Voloshin awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Catalin Carp of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 81, Nikolay Voloshin awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ufa's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Oleg Danchenko is replacing Aleksandr Sukhov for the home team.
In the minute 83, Dmitri Sysuev is on a sub for Timur Zhamaletdinov for Ufa.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fedor Chalov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Neftyanik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 87, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ufa.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kristijan Bistrovic for CSKA Moscow has been booked by Nikolay Voloshin and receives a first yellow card.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa.
Nikolay Giorgobyani's header is off-target for Ufa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Nikolay Voloshin will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick Ufa.
CSKA Moscow drive upfield and Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ufa defender.
CSKA Moscow push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Arnor Sigurdsson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ufa defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kristijan Bistrovic for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
